articles.description: Halsey's latest show was put to an end before it even began, after serious flooding in the venue messed the whole night up.
articles.content:
Halsey's fans didn't get a concert, but they certainly got wet ... all thanks to some serious rain that shut down the show before it even started.
The "Without Me" singer was set to perform at the M… [+765 chars]

articles.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore
articles.title: Nope's final trailer reveals true horror Jordan Peele's been hiding this whole time - The Verge
articles.description: It’s not just the weather that’s terrorizing everyone in the final trailer for Nope — out July 22nd — Jordan Peele’s latest horror meant to make you sweat.
articles.content: Its not just the weather
